title: Slow Patching Anyone?
body: Is anyone else experiencing slow update/patching speeds?  I'm getting 10-30 KBps over a gigabit connection

replies.body:
Are you seeing this at a particular point in patching or during the entire process? During the first 32%, your client is scanning files inside your local directory, to find any broken or missing files before it decides where new files will go. Anything at 33% and onward is when your client is pulling files from the patching servers and applying changes to your directory. 

Let me know a bit more details so I can assist you in speeding up your patching times.
